data.eml:eml: Description of Sarsilatona cf. fernandoi (Rane, 1983) (Crustacea: Cladocera: Sididae) found in the south of Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Korovchinsky, Nikolai M. (2011): Description of Sarsilatona cf. fernandoi (Rane, 1983) (Crustacea: Cladocera: Sididae) found in the south of Vietnam. Zootaxa 3129: 29-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205477
